messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt is a custom node that helps users understand what they are prompting for each property as they build their prompts in ComfyUI.
How many properties are currently available in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt currently has 10 properties available, with the Base property being mandatory.
What are the two ways to use ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt in conjunction with other tools?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt can be used in conjunction with CLIP Text Encode (Prompt) or with the Show Text item in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts to line up the entered prompts.
What box needs to be checked to connect ScenarioPrompt to a prompt?
To connect ScenarioPrompt to a prompt, the 'Convert text to input' box must be checked for CLIP Text Encode (Prompt).
How can ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt be installed?

ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt can be installed by navigating to the custom_nodes directory in the ComfyUI installation path and cloning the GitHub repository using the command 'git clone https://github.com/Ludobico/ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt.git'.
What inspired the autocomplete feature in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
The autocomplete feature in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt was inspired by two source codes: ComfyUI - CustomNode Unlimited Prompt and NovelAI.app.
Where does ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt source its tags for autocomplete?
The tags used for autocomplete in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt are based on NovelAI.app's Google Sheet.
What is ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt is a custom node in ComfyUI that allows users to easily organize and understand prompts based on different attributes when writing prompts.
How many attributes are available in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt provides 10 attributes, and the Base attribute is required.
How can ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt be connected to CLIP Text Encode (Prompt)?
ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt can be connected to CLIP Text Encode (Prompt) using the 'Convert text to input' option, which must be checked.
How can users view the entered prompts in a row using ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
Users can view the entered prompts in a row using the 'Show Text' option in ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts.
What are the installation steps for ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?

To install ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt, users need to navigate to the custom_nodes directory in their ComfyUI installation and clone the repository using the command: git clone https://github.com/Ludobico/ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt.git
What inspired the creation of the autocomplete feature in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
The autocomplete feature in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt was inspired by ComfyUI - CustomNode Unlimited Prompt and NovelAI.app.
What is the source of the tags used for autocomplete in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt?
The tags used for autocomplete in ComfyUI-ScenarioPrompt are based on the Google Sheet from NovelAI.app.
